value:
$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|What to do, what to do...$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|Hi, Daddy! I'm home!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|Hey, Selkie! Did you have fun
playing outside?$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|Tons! Maybe a little bit too much,
actually. Hehe...look.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|That is certainly a broken...thing.$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|It used to be a hagoita! Oh, and
the kite got stuck in a tree... I guess
I'm all out of stuff to play with.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|Selkie, that's it! You're a genius!$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|Huh? I am?$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|$Fi1500|Yes! This kite is destroyed almost
beyond recognition! It's a work of art!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|This hagoita is perfect...
Look at the splinters...$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|I'm so glad we found a way to cheer
you two up. It's all thanks to Selkie!$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|I still don't get it. What'd I do?$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|There was a big cleanup effort
recently, and all the stuff these two
had been collecting got thrown out.$k$pIt was an accident, but it still put
them in a bad mood—and right
around New Year's too.$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|I guess it would be pretty easy
to mistake Velouria's collection
of treasures for, um...garbage.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|I was at a loss for how to help when
your appetite for destruction came
along to save the day.$k$pNot only did you get to play your
heart out, you got to make
a wonderful gift for our friends!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|Thank you, Selkie. I'll treasure this
hagoita for the rest of my life.$k$p$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|Yeah, thanks! Hey—that gives me
an idea, Velouria!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|What is it, Daddy?$k$p$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|Whenever we run low on treasures...
we can just make our own! I can't
believe I didn't think of it before.$k$pSay... There's a tournament going on
now, isn't there? Think of all the
stuff we could break!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|Great idea, Daddy! We don't even
need to win... We can make our
own prize!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|Oh no. What have we done...$k$p

$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|Behold our conquest! Gaze upon
our mountain of treasure!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|A shattered shield... A snapped
lance... A ripped cape... So many
New Year's gifts.$k$pRest now, paws. You've done well.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|Well, you two are about as happy
as I've ever seen you, so that's good.$k$pWe probably shouldn't let that
commander find out you broke all
this stuff on purpose, though.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Broke what on purpose, now?$k$p$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|Hi, Commander Anna!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|Gah! She's here!$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|I did find it odd you were both so
focused on breaking your opponents'
stuff instead of...y'know. Winning.$k$p$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|Hehehe...$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|It's OK. I'm not mad.$k$pWe were the ones who threw your
collection away by accident, so what
happened today was on us.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|Phew... I was sure we were in for
a real rough start to the year...$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|Thanks, Commander Anna...$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Sure. In return, though, I'm going to
ask you both to put in work equal to
the cost of what you broke. Deal?$k$p$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|You got it! We'll shred our enemies
apart faster than you can blink!$k$pYou'll be glad these claws and teeth
are working for you, Commander!$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|You bet I will. With this year's budget,
I'll take every bare-handed fighter
I can get...$k$p
